page.title: 17Things I like to do.
page.content: Things I do: I read a lot of books about planes and make models. I go to the playing fields on the swings,play snooker at the youth club and climb on the rocks. I go fishing for trout in the River Derwent at Darley Dale. I ride on the BMX track and my sister goes horse riding. I like to play football on the pitch/ I go to Matlock to learn judo. Sometimes I watch fox hunting when they cross our land. My dad goes Morris dancing,mumming and clog dancing. I like learning the piano and guitar and we go swimming at Matlock Lido on Saturdays. West Derbyshire is mainly rural but has major cities on its boundaries with a range of recreations.
